comments:
If you close the report tab (not the window) in a saved report
(or at least a saved data->disk->capacity->by_disk report) it
blows lunch with an array out of bounds exception (see below).
In this particular case what is supposed to happen is closing the
tab close the window (which is not what happens in the non-saved 
report case). So, it looks like a race between the tab pane and
the DDI window.
Probably a day oner from TPC 3 (though I haven't verified)...
xception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
